$(bold)Breeding Behavior:$()$(br2)After two ostrichs fell in love, one of them will search the nearest sand-block to build a nest on it.$(br)If there is already an empty nest nearby, the ostrich will choose this to lay the egg.$(br)The egg will need some time, before an ostrich baby will hatch.
An ostrich laying an egg into its nest.
